onset.Description: Onset of a button release (either left or right), corresponding to raising of a hand.

duration.Description: Duration of the button released. Modeled as instantaneous event, so the duration is 0 seconds.

trial.Description: The current trial within this stage (see 'stage').

hand_raised.Description: Which hand was raised (i.e., which button was released).

Levels.left: The left hand was raised (i.e., left button was released)
Levels.right: The right hand was raised (i.e., right button was released)

value.Description: The code (EEG Marker value) associated with an event

Levels.1: Release of left button (i.e., raising left hand)
Levels.2: Release of right button (i.e., raising right hand)

sample.Description: The sample within the EEG data at which the button release event occurred (i.e., a hand was raised). This variable is using 1-based indexing.

countdown_onset.Description: Onset of the countdown after which to raise a hand (duration: 3 s).

countdown_offset.Description: Offset of the countdown. Must raise a hand now.

response_time.Description: Reaction time to lift the left or right hand after the countdown reached zero.

feedback_onset_approx.Description: Approximate onset of the bci-produced feedback (either a left or a right hand visual stimulus).

stim_file.Description: Name of the stimulus file that was shown during this trial at 'feedback_onset_approx'.

trial_type.Description: Which hand was raised, and did this match the BCIs prediction (lose outcome), or not (win outcome).

Levels.raised-left/match-false: raised left hand, bci predicted right hand
Levels.raised-left/match-true: raised left hand, bci predicted left hand
Levels.raised-right/match-false: raised right hand, bci predicted left hand
Levels.raised-right/match-true: raised right hand, bci predicted right hand

HED.raised-left/match-true: (Agent-action, Participant-response, (Lift, (Hand, (Left-side-of, Experiment-participant))), (Release, (Mouse-button, (Left-side-of, Experiment-participant)))), (Delay, Duration, (Approximately-equal-to, Time-block/68 ms)), (Sensory-event, Visual-presentation, (Drawing, (ID/left_hand.png, Hand, (Left-side-of, Computer-screen))), (Feedback, Penalty)), Description/Subject raised left hand and computer presented image of hand to left side
HED.raised-left/match-false: (Agent-action, Participant-response, (Lift, (Hand, (Left-side-of, Experiment-participant))), (Release, (Mouse-button, (Left-side-of, Experiment-participant)))), (Delay, Duration, (Approximately-equal-to, Time-block/68 ms)), (Sensory-event, Visual-presentation, (Drawing, (ID/right_hand.png, Hand, (Right-side-of, Computer-screen))), (Feedback, Reward)), Description/Subject raised left hand and computer presented image of hand to right side
HED.raised-right/match-true: (Agent-action, Participant-response, (Lift, (Hand, (Right-side-of, Experiment-participant))), (Release, (Mouse-button, (Right-side-of, Experiment-participant)))), (Delay, Duration, (Approximately-equal-to, Time-block/68 ms)), (Sensory-event, Visual-presentation, (Drawing, (ID/right_hand.png, Hand, (Right-side-of, Computer-screen))), (Feedback, Penalty)), Description/Subject raised right hand and computer presented image of hand to right side
HED.raised-right/match-false: (Agent-action, Participant-response, (Lift, (Hand, (Right-side-of, Experiment-participant))), (Release, (Mouse-button, (Right-side-of, Experiment-participant)))), (Delay, Duration, (Approximately-equal-to, Time-block/68 ms)), (Sensory-event, Visual-presentation, (Drawing, (ID/left_hand.png, Hand, (Left-side-of, Computer-screen))), (Feedback, Reward)), Description/Subject raised right hand and computer presented image of hand to left side

stage.Description: The current 'stage' of the experiment, which relates to how the BCI makes predictions.

Levels.2: Stage 2. BCI makes predictions after being trained on data from stage 1.
Levels.3: Stage 3. BCI makes predictions after being trained on data from stages 1 and 2.

bci_prediction.Description: What hand (left/right) did the BCI predict to be raised.

latency.Description: Estimated beginning of the data chunk used for the BCI prediction with respect to 'onset' (when a hand was raised / a button was released).

n_repeated.Description: In case the participant did not adhere to the task rules, the trial was aborted and repeated (e.g., if a hand was raised before the countdown was over). 'n_repeated' tracks how many trials in total within this 'stage' had to be repeated before the trial described in a given row.
